main event: A civilian in Miamisburg, Ohio reported seeing a bright, slowly moving object in the sky that appeared to move around and reverse direction in an intentional manner.
interesting points: The object was much brighter than a star and appeared to be small in size.
The object was observed moving from northwest to southeast at around 2:30 AM on a bright, clear night.
The witness described the object's movements as 'intentional' and said it appeared to reverse direction.
The report notes that this was the first time the witness had sighted a flying object.
The report indicates that this was a standard witness statement and that no further details or documentation were available.
